name: Duty of Army Frontline 3D
description:
Duty of Army Frontline 3D is an army gunner shoot war 3d game where your gorilla commando skills and counter terrorism attack tactics will be tested. Being a part of the Special Forces it will be required to fight behind enemy lines and carry out vigilante killing mission against the terrorist by shoot attacking simultaneously at them.
Features
New technology gadgets and weapons
Testing of good fighting and survival skills
Real 3D Environments and Characters
Smooth game controls
Easy and smooth controls
